title: Design Architecture for Real-Time Multiplayer Game Engine
description: Define the overall structure and components of the game engine, focusing on real-time multiplayer gaming, physics simulations, and state synchronization across multiple players.

title: Implement Networking Layer for Real-Time Communication
description: Develop the networking layer responsible for real-time communication between clients in a multiplayer environment, ensuring low latency and minimal data loss.
dependencies: Design Architecture for Real-Time Multiplayer Game Engine

title: Develop Physics Simulation Module
description: Create a physics simulation module that handles real-time movement, collisions, and interactions between game objects.
dependencies: Design Architecture for Real-Time Multiplayer Game Engine

title: Create User Interface Design for Real-Time Multiplayer Game Engine
description: Develop the user interface design for the game engine, ensuring an intuitive and responsive experience for players.
dependencies: Design Architecture for Real-Time Multiplayer Game Engine

title: Implement State Synchronization Mechanism
description: Develop a mechanism to keep the state of the game synchronized across all connected clients, minimizing lag and ensuring fairness.
dependencies: Design Architecture for Real-Time Multiplayer Game Engine

title: Perform Security Audit on Real-Time Multiplayer Game Engine
description: Review and identify potential security vulnerabilities in the game engine, ensuring data protection and privacy for all users.
dependencies: Design Architecture for Real-Time Multiplayer Game Engine
